article_title: Why Montenegro Was Just Invited to Join the NATO Alliance
article_text:
Don’t have time to read the Washington Post or New York Times? Then get The Morning Bell, an early morning edition of the day’s most important political news, conservative commentary and original reporting from a team committed to following the truth no matter where it leads.

Email address

article_metadata.description: Montenegro’s inclusion in the NATO alliance bolsters regional and trans-Atlantic security and sends a strong message of strength to friend and foe alike.
